text: Money Lion is a full service bank without the hassles.  Im in the middle of my 2nd loan and it was the easiest transaction ever. And it helps with my credit.  I also use Money Lion as my regular bank now and there is also a convenient instacash function which helps when the funds run out before payday.  In more than three years I've never had any problems ever. Join us!! You won't regret it.

text: Very helpful. Just wish you weren’t only able to pull $50 out at a time. For the company it’s good Bc they want you to tip for everytime you borrow money. But I’d rather tip/pay transfer fee more if I was able to pick how much I needed all at once.
title: Very helpful.. but

reply.message: We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text: Excellent! On my second loan and almost paid off! I just wished they gave me the credit card! I think that would help my credit. Just ditched my bank so my direct deposit should hit next week with all of MoneyLion perks!
title: Ditched My Traditional Bank!

text: I will begin by saying if I could give them -5 stars I would. MoneyLion has the worst customer service of any company I have ever dealt with before.  I have been trying to speak with a manager for the past 5 days. In that time I have been hung up on, told I would get a call back which never happened and I have been lied to. After I receive the money I have been entitled to I will cancel my subscription and close my account. My advice, keep away from these crooks.
title: Worst service ever

reply.message:
Hi Melissa,
We are reaching out to you directly to resolve your concern! Thank you!!
